cells.block_code:
def Format_Asset_Lookup(action=None, success=None, container=None, results=None, handle=None, filtered_artifacts=None, filtered_results=None, custom_function=None, **kwargs):
    phantom.debug('Format_Asset_Lookup() called')
    
    template = """| `reverse_asset_lookup(\"{0}\")`
| strcat asset_vendor \" : \" asset_model asset_vendor_model
| rex field=zone \"level[_]*(?<zone_no>\\d+)\"
| mvexpand zone_no
| table asset asset_id asset_vendor_model asset_model asset_status asset_system asset_tag asset_type asset_vendor asset_version bunit category city classification country description dns exposure ip location mac nt_host owner pci_domain priority requires_av should_timesync should_update site_id vlan zone zone_no
| rex field=ip \"^(?P<net_local>\\d+\\.\\d+)\""""

    # parameter list for template variable replacement
    parameters = [
        "artifact:*.cef.dvc",
    ]

    phantom.format(container=container, template=template, parameters=parameters, name="Format_Asset_Lookup")

    Search_OT_Asset(container=container)

    return
cells.name: format

| table asset asset_id asset_vendor_model asset_model asset_status asset_system asset_tag asset_type asset_vendor asset_version bunit category city classification country description dns exposure ip location mac nt_host owner pci_domain priority requires_av should_timesync should_update site_id vlan zone zone_no
| rex field=ip "^(?P<net_local>\d+\.\d+)"

cells.block_code:
def filter_1(action=None, success=None, container=None, results=None, handle=None, filtered_artifacts=None, filtered_results=None, custom_function=None, **kwargs):
    phantom.debug('filter_1() called')

    # collect filtered artifact ids for 'if' condition 1
    matched_artifacts_1, matched_results_1 = phantom.condition(
        container=container,
        action_results=results,
        conditions=[
            ["Check_Network_New_Outbound_URL:action_result.summary.total_events", ">", 0],
        ],
        name="filter_1:condition_1")

    # call connected blocks if filtered artifacts or results
    if matched_artifacts_1 or matched_results_1:
        Format_Pin_Network_New_Outbound_URL(action=action, success=success, container=container, results=results, handle=handle, custom_function=custom_function, filtered_artifacts=matched_artifacts_1, filtered_results=matched_results_1)
        Add_Note_Format(action=action, success=success, container=container, results=results, handle=handle, custom_function=custom_function, filtered_artifacts=matched_artifacts_1, filtered_results=matched_results_1)

    # collect filtered artifact ids for 'if' condition 2
    matched_artifacts_2, matched_results_2 = phantom.condition(
        container=container,
        action_results=results,
        conditions=[
            ["Check_Network_New_Outbound_URL:action_result.summary.total_events", "==", 0],
        ],
        name="filter_1:condition_2")

    # call connected blocks if filtered artifacts or results
    if matched_artifacts_2 or matched_results_2:
        pass

    return

cells.block_code:
def Format_Network_New_Outbound_URL(action=None, success=None, container=None, results=None, handle=None, filtered_artifacts=None, filtered_results=None, custom_function=None, **kwargs):
    phantom.debug('Format_Network_New_Outbound_URL() called')
    
    template = """| tstats `summariesonly` values(All_Traffic.action) as action,values(All_Traffic.src_port) as src_port,values(All_Traffic.dest_port) as dest_port,count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where earliest=-2d latest=now ( All_Traffic.src=\"{0}\" ) ( NOT All_Traffic.dest=\"10*\" NOT All_Traffic.dest=\"172.*\" NOT All_Traffic.dest=\"173.*\" ) ( All_Traffic.dest_port=\"53\" OR All_Traffic.dest_port=\"443\" All_Traffic.dest_port=\"80\" ) by _time, All_Traffic.src, All_Traffic.dest, All_Traffic.dest_port span=1d
| `drop_dm_object_name(\"All_Traffic\")` 
| sort - count 
| eval today=now()
| eval today=strftime(today,\"%Y-%m-%d\")
| eval date=strftime(_time,\"%Y-%m-%d\")
| fields date,today,src,dest,action,transport,count,dest_port
| stats sum(count) as count, dc(date) as date_dc, values(date) as date_val, values(dest_port) as dest_port by src dest today
| table src,dest,today,count,dest_port"""

    # parameter list for template variable replacement
    parameters = [
        "Search_OT_Asset:action_result.data.*.ip",
        "artifact:*.cef.dvc",
    ]

    phantom.format(container=container, template=template, parameters=parameters, name="Format_Network_New_Outbound_URL")

    Check_Network_New_Outbound_URL(container=container)

    return
cells.name: format
cells.template:
| tstats `summariesonly` values(All_Traffic.action) as action,values(All_Traffic.src_port) as src_port,values(All_Traffic.dest_port) as dest_port,count from datamodel=Network_Traffic.All_Traffic where earliest=-2d latest=now ( All_Traffic.src="{0}" ) ( NOT All_Traffic.dest="10*" NOT All_Traffic.dest="172.*" NOT All_Traffic.dest="173.*" ) ( All_Traffic.dest_port="53" OR All_Traffic.dest_port="443" All_Traffic.dest_port="80" ) by _time, All_Traffic.src, All_Traffic.dest, All_Traffic.dest_port span=1d
| `drop_dm_object_name("All_Traffic")` 
| sort - count 
| eval today=now()
| eval today=strftime(today,"%Y-%m-%d")
| eval date=strftime(_time,"%Y-%m-%d")
| fields date,today,src,dest,action,transport,count,dest_port
| stats sum(count) as count, dc(date) as date_dc, values(date) as date_val, values(dest_port) as dest_port by src dest today
| table src,dest,today,count,dest_port
cells.title: format

cells.block_code:
def Add_Note_Format(action=None, success=None, container=None, results=None, handle=None, filtered_artifacts=None, filtered_results=None, custom_function=None, **kwargs):
    phantom.debug('Add_Note_Format() called')
    
    template = """|src|dest|today|count|
|--|--|--|--|
%%
|{0}|{1}|{2}|{3}|
%%"""

    # parameter list for template variable replacement
    parameters = [
        "Check_Network_New_Outbound_URL:action_result.data.*.src",
        "Check_Network_New_Outbound_URL:action_result.data.*.dest",
        "Check_Network_New_Outbound_URL:action_result.data.*.today",
        "Check_Network_New_Outbound_URL:action_result.data.*.count",
    ]

    phantom.format(container=container, template=template, parameters=parameters, name="Add_Note_Format")

    add_note_3(container=container)

    return
cells.name: format
cells.title: format

cells.block_code:
def add_note_3(action=None, success=None, container=None, results=None, handle=None, filtered_artifacts=None, filtered_results=None, custom_function=None, **kwargs):
    phantom.debug('add_note_3() called')

    formatted_data_1 = phantom.get_format_data(name='Add_Note_Format')

    note_title = "Check Network New Outbound Detected"
    note_content = formatted_data_1
    note_format = "markdown"
    phantom.add_note(container=container, note_type="general", title=note_title, content=note_content, note_format=note_format)

    return
cells.name: add note
